content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]ADR Chambers has been providing Integrity Commissioner services since 2011. ADR Chambers Integrity Commissioners have extensive experience conducting investigations and making recommendations.

For information on filing a complaint with Integrity Commissioner, please click on the appropriate link below:

  • City of Brantford
  • The Town of Fort Erie
  • The Town of Georgina
  • The Town of Grimsby
  • Haldimand County
  • The City of Kawartha Lakes
  • City of Kitchener
  • The Municipality of Leamington
  • City of Markham
  • City of Niagara Falls
  • The Town of Niagara-On-The-Lake
  • Regional Municipality of Niagara
  • The Township of North Dumfries
  • The Town of Pelham
  • City of Port Colborne
  • City of Timmins
  • The Township of Wainfleet
  • City of Waterloo
  • Township of Woolwich

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ el_class=”hidden-print”][vc_custom_heading text=”Other ADR Services” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”menu-header”][vc_wp_custommenu nav_menu=”66″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
